description: Quaderno is a tax software that handles sales tax, VAT, and GST for your online business. Automatically calculates tax, sends receipts and invoices, and provides instant multi-channel tax reports for your sales around the world.

actions.name: createContact
actions.description: Create a new contact in Quaderno (customer or vendor)

actions.name: createExpense
actions.description: Create a new expense in Quaderno

actions.name: createInvoice
actions.description: Create a new invoice in Quaderno

actions.name: findContact
actions.description: Search and list contacts from Quaderno
